configure.title: Configure Cat Care Tracker
configure.description: Enter your Google Spreadsheet ID (found in the URL: {spreadsheet_url}) and your cat's name.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Google Sheets. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.spreadsheet_not_found: Spreadsheet not found. Please verify the spreadsheet ID is correct. It should be a long string of letters and numbers from your spreadsheet URL.
error.no_permission: You don't have permission to access this spreadsheet. Make sure you're signed in with the correct Google account and that the account has access to the spreadsheet.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please try removing and re-adding the integration to re-authenticate.
error.invalid_spreadsheet: Invalid spreadsheet ID or no access. Make sure you have access to the spreadsheet.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Check the Home Assistant logs for more details.

abort.missing_configuration: Application credentials not configured. Please configure them first.

application_credentials.description:
Follow the [instructions]({more_info_url}) to configure your Google Cloud project:
1. Go to [Google Cloud Console]({oauth_creds_url})
2. Create OAuth 2.0 credentials
3. Set authorized redirect URI to: `https://my.home-assistant.io/redirect/oauth`
4. Enable the Google Sheets API
